cpg.util

Class WordStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpg.util.WordStatistics

  • public class WordStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a helper class that provides information about the German language letter frequencies. It can calculate the average letter frequency for a specific word. The words can be sorted by frequency, i.e. the words with the best average frequencies are on the top of the map. This provides the crossword generator with statistic information, to place good words at good positions.
    See Also:
    CrosswordGenerator
